apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices portrays a tender moment with a man of light skin tone leaning in for a kiss, complete with soft, rounded cheeks and a gentle expression. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the figure a warm, almost tangible quality, emphasizing affection and intimacy. It's a heartfelt way to convey love, romantic feelings, or a sweet farewell in digital messages.
